Author: love_blue_
Text: My therapist is on maternity leave all month but I’m sure she’ll notice the weight loss. I’m gonna keep it quiet because I’ll get taken off my meds that let me function daily if my ED is back.

Author: Danikah
Text: I’m sorry you’re struggling. I urge you to discuss your triggers and thoughts with a therapist.   I wish you nothing but the best. Remember recovery is never a straight line and try not to be too hard on yourself. Catching your thoughts and reaching out for support is key.
